DOC.brief_summary: Strength train increase muscle mass strength improve bone density reduce risk osteoporosis related fracture . Strength training also lead reduce risk diabetes , heart disease , arthritis , depression , obesity ; improve self-confidence , sleep vitality . Research demonstrate strength train extremely effective help age adult chronic condition prevent onset disease , many instance , actually reverse disease process . In Stay Strong , Stay Healthy Program elderly subject perform resistance exercise training ( RET ) twice every week . Past literature suggest resistance training improved muscle activity , muscle strength , muscle mass , bone mineral density total body composition , adiponectin , insulin sensitivity , fast blood-glucose ( BG ) , HbA1c1 ( long-term marker BG ) , blood pressure ( BP ) , blood triglyceride ( TGs ) low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) healthy diabetic subject . The purpose study measure change discuss variable 8-weeks resistance exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Outcomes Stay Strong Stay Healthy Program
DOC.detailed_description: Participants perform resistance exercise 8 week measurement ( anthropometric , electromyography , pulse wave velocity , strength test , dual x-ray absorptiometry , blood enzymes/hormones , sleep , diet , memory survey ) perform pre- post-exercise program .
DOC.criteria: Age 60 Enrollment Stay Strong Stay Healthy Program Strength train < 2 hours/week past 3 month Not enrol Stay Strong Stay Healthy Program Strength train > 2 hours/week past 3 month Donated 463 ml blood past 8 week Physician discourage participate
